title: A ‘Period Dignity Officer’ Seemed Like a Good Idea. Until a Man Was Named.
description: The job in the Scottish region of Tayside was eliminated after a groundswell of anger that a man would be overseeing, or ‘mansplaining,’ menstruation policy.
dc:creator: Emma Bubola
media:description: The Scottish Parliament. Scotland was the first country to adopt a law requiring universal free access to period products.
